name: AIM (Asian Institute of Management)
briefDescription: Asian Institute om Management (Aim) is committed to accelerate social, economical, cultural and political change and ensure its sustainability for every women, men, girls and boys.Our mission to work for/with marginalized, stigmatized and excluded women, men and girls and boys to address their basic needs and enhance their quality of life.Aim  works for mobilizing community and form community organization and building alliances with a diverse range of civil society organizations from local to national and global support. We  focus are on supporting community to improve their livelihood. Aim have deepen its  policy advocacy efforts by sensitizing bureaucrats, judiciary and other stake holders.
